title: Akali Twilight shroud bug
body: The new {{champion:84}} twilight shroud is bugged. The enemy akali was able to use my twilight shroud with me inside it, like she casted it herself. It also worked the other way round. Is this like the {{champion:119}}  axe catching thing or is it not intended. Has anyone else encountered it yet?

replies.body: This is intended :^), its what makes Akali One For All so interesting.
